name: BrainRepair
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 --- Theme "Repair"

Jam Page : https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/brain-repair-3

Jam Site : III Taipei Site, Taiwan

※Credits

Engineer: Lyla Kao, TsungYi Li, Feather Chung

Artist: Weichen Lin, Linda Huang

Planner: Luke Liu

------------------------------------------------------------------------

There's a poor cat whose brain is severely damaged,

You have to repair her nerves and keep her save in this imaginary world!

By connecting "Action" and "KeyCode" with nerves and press the corresponding key , you can tell her what to do to complete these level.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mouse Left Click : Drag nerves to build connection between "Action" and "KeyCode"

Keyboard "A", "D" : Rotate the nerve you are holding

Keyboard "Z", "X", "C" : Trigger the action connected to these KeyCode

Keyboard "R" : Restart if you run into anything weird!

------------------------------------------------------------------------
